name: Gorilla Bullet Hell
description:
You are a gorilla trying to survive the raging battle around you. Turn by turn, avoid the enemies weapons. Use the arrow keys to control the Gorilla protagonist.

Two versions of the game are available, one with our preset map and one with a prototype randomizer we put together for fun to test your mettle against.

The team made the game with an emphasis on keeping it chill and small.
